GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.10.140
GSD.description:
rxrpc: Fix locking in rxrpc's sendmsg

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.140 by commit 79e2ca7aa96e80961828ab6312264633b66183cc, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit bc5e3a546d553e5223851fc199e69040eb70f68b. For more details please see the references link.
